transcript:
Customer: Hello?
H Executive: Hello? Krishna sir, good morning. Krishna sir, good morning. Vasundhara bol rahi hu IndiaMART se. Kaise hai aap?
Customer: Thik hi hai.
Executive: Accha sir, aapki service chal rahi hai IndiaMART pe Uttam Furniture House ke naam se.
Customer: Haan, haan.
Executive: Right. Kal na jo aapke account manager hai Anshika, unse aapka discussion hua tha. So service ke liye unhone aapko guide kiya tha call pe, right sir?
Customer: Haan, haan.
Executive: Okay. But sir, call ke baad na aapke paas ek WhatsApp pe message jaata hai ki aap jo discussion hua hai service ke regarding mein aap satisfy hai ya nahi. So aapne us pe not satisfy feedback share kiya hai. So mai jaan sakti hu sir ki kya issue aa raha hai? Matlab Anshika ne kya aapko guide nahi kiya hai? Aapko kuch aur query doubts hai, aap bata sakte hai mujhe.
Customer: Yeh not satisfied matlab?
Executive: Matlab ki Anshika ne jo bhi service aapko guide kari usse aap satisfy nahi ho. Matlab aap khush nahi hai jo services unhone aapko provide kari. Service jo bhi aapko phone par guide kiya, jaise bhi aapke catalog ke bare mein bataya, kaise service use karni hai, lead use karni hai.
Customer: Kya hai? Aapne not satisfy kiya?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Suniye na, aap mai toh jo mobile mein jo karta hai na aap log, hum toh nahi sakte. Hum phone se aapne phone de diya. Hai na?
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Toh galti se ho gaya tha kya sir?
Customer: Mobile chalana nahi aata.
Executive: Accha. Toh fir kya aapki beti se hua hai?
Customer: General ho gaya hai toh.
Executive: Aapki beti se ho gaya tha kya?
Customer: Nahi, humse hi ho gaya hai. Abhi toh.
Executive: Accha, aap se ho gaya tha?
Customer: Haan. Hum toh dukaan mein hai abhi.
Executive: Accha, accha. Koi baat nahi. Waise services aapko...
Customer: Haan, boliye, boliye sir.
Customer: Mobile mein thoda hum kacha hai, kacha. Mane expert nahi hai abhi tak.
Executive: Accha, accha. Sir, yeh bataiye toh jo bhi services unhone batai aapko Anshika ji ne samjhaya, saari cheez clear hai sir?
Customer: Haan, clear toh hai lekin woh jo mane humko order kaise milega woh toh hum toh abhi tak samajh mein nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Sir, order jaise ki koi buyer aapke paas budget bhejta hai, aap unhe consume karke buyer se baat karoge. Fir direct calls aapke paas aayega. Aapke mail pe inquiry jo aayegi us pe aap baat karoge phone karke. Aapko buyer batayega ki haan requirement hai. Tab aap uske baad jaise deal karte hai aap waise deal kariyega.
Customer: Okay, okay.
Executive: Hai na? Aap agar kisi time bhi available ho video meeting pe aa sakte hai. Ya aapki beti agar video meeting pe aa sakti hai toh aap aa jaiye. Hum aapko online bata dete hai saari cheeze screen share karke kaise service use karni hogi sir.
Customer: Accha, accha.
Executive: Aap aa payenge video meeting pe sir?
Customer: Nahi, hum toh nahi sakta hai na isliye toh mushkil ho gaya. Accha, accha, toh aapki beti kab aati hai? Matlab kab available hogi aapki beti kab aapke saath rahegi?
Customer: Hmm. Waise hum thodi der mein jayenge, ghar jayenge uske baad hi hoga.
Executive: Accha, accha. Koi baat nahi. Jab aap ghar jayenge na sir toh aap bataiyega. Anshika ka number aapke paas hai? Save kiya hai aapne number uska?
Customer: Haan, haan, haan.
Executive: Sir, ek kaam kariye WhatsApp pe usne kal aapko ek hi message bheja tha. Us number ko save kar dijiyega. Mai fir se se fir se usse message karwa deti hu us number pe. Aap uska number save kar lijiyega. Kahi bhi koi issue aata hai service mein aapko kuch puchna hai, samajhna hai toh aap Anshika ko us number pe call kar sakte hai kabhi bhi sir. Thik hai? Office hour mein 9:00 to 6:00.
Executive: Thik hai? Baki ka aap services properly use kijiyega. Jo bhi buyers ke calls aate hai woh aap mat miss kijiyega. Agar aap kahi busy bhi hai sir kaam mein toh aap woh call utha lijiyega buyers. Aap unko bol dijiyega ki aap call back kar lenge. But miss karne se kya hota hai aapki calls flow down ho jata hai. Aapke catalog pe bhi impact padta hai.
Customer: Thik hai, thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai? Aur sir ji jo abhi catalog mein aapke product wagera update hai, iske alawa koi aur naye product range update karni hai ya sir aapke pure sare updated hai?
Customer: Accha, accha, thik hai. Naye toh abhi tak nahi hai. Saman toh band hai.
Executive: Accha.
Customer: Complete ho jayega uske baad hum isko bhejenge aapko.
Executive: Koi baat nahi. Aap Anshika ke WhatsApp number pe message bhej dijiyega. Photo bhej dijiyega.
Customer: Hmm, hmm.
Executive: Thik hai? Toh woh aapka sara add kar degi. Accha bataiye sir aapne jo product jo aap deal karte ho lakdi isme wood mein, sir teak wood ka hi lakdi use karte ho?
Customer: Haan, teak wood. Haan, teak wood ka.
Executive: Teak wood ka aur bhi koi hai kya? Sagwan ya kuch bhi aur hota hai? Aur bhi koi hai ki teak wood hi akela?
Customer: Even hota hai, sisam bhi hota hai.
Executive: Sisam bhi.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Gamar ek lakdi hai gamar ka. Woh bhi hota hai.
Executive: Accha.
Executive: Accha, accha.
Executive: Accha, accha. Customer ko customer ko jis tarah ka lakdi chahiye us tarah ka lakdi mil jayega. Us tarah ke aap bana ke dete hai?
Customer: Haan, haan, haan. Agar customer bole ki humko gamar chahiye toh hum gamar se deke banayenge. Fir uska rate bhi kam ho jayega.
Customer: Hai na?
Executive: Hmm, hmm.
Executive: Thik hai sir, koi baat nahi.
Customer: Gamar hai aur...
Executive: Accha. Thik hai.
Executive: Aur, aur?
Customer: Aur chap bolta hai lakdi hai chap.
Customer: Ek hota hai.
Executive: Sir, jab aapka jab aapka na sara complete ho jayega na toh ek bar aap hume WhatsApp pe bhej dijiyega. Hum sara aapka hi update kara denge, thik hai? Baki ka sir abhi jo aapka ticket open hua tha aapne aise not satisfy mark kiya tha, mai abhi dobara se close kar rahi hu yeh ticket. Aapke paas dobara se WhatsApp pe ek feedback aayega. Thik hai? Toh aap us pe ab is bar satisfy kar dijiyega.
Customer: Yes wala yes.
Executive: Accha, accha. Thik hai? N O T not satisfy mat kijiyega. Jis pe satisfy likha hua hai na not nahi likha us pe kijiyega satisfy, thik hai?
Customer: Hmm, hmm, hmm.
Executive: Thik hai sir?
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Chaliye thik hai. Thank you so much for your time, sir.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer marked 'not satisfied' by mistake.

- Customer doesn't understand how to get orders.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the order process.

- Executive offered a video meeting for assistance.

- Executive will close the ticket and resend feedback.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will save Anshika's number.

- Customer will send product updates via WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- not satisfied, order process, video meeting, product update
